text: Lucas Oil Stadium is in Indianapolis, Indiana and is the home of the Indianapolis Colts, an NFL team. The stadium had its first game on August 24, 2008 when the Colts played the Buffalo Bills. The stadium also hosted the 2015 final four between the Wisconsin Badgers and the previously unbeaten Kentucky Wildcats. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:National Football League venues Category:Sports buildings in the United States Category:Indianapolis Category:Buildings and structures in Indiana Category:2008 establishments in the United States Category:21st- century establishments in Indiana
title: Lucas Oil Stadium
